Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory302.png'}
{3: 'No longer able to support its own weight, the broken mechanoid collapses onto the ground, incapacitated.'}
{2: "How's Lucia doing?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Lucia! We\'ve immobilized the red faction\'s "leader"!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The blue faction\'s "leader" has been immobilized, too!', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Right as Lucia gives the all-clear, the deafening sound of air sirens begins to ring.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "What's going on?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory306.png'}
{2: 'Alarm', 3: 'Vital signs for both faction leaders have been terminated.'}
{2: 'Alarm', 3: 'Cycle of War #*（）——+& results: null.'}
{2: 'Alarm', 3: 'Initiating removal procedure according to Directive Number 2 of the "Naraka Bastille Protocol" enacted by the School of Sapienism.'}
{2: 'Alarm', 3: 'Humans and mechanoids in target areas, please evacuate the facility before the removal procedure is executed in your area.'}
{2: 'Alarm', 3: 'All glory to homo sapiens. May the next "war" determine a champion.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The entire area is beginning to shake... What happened?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "The entire cave is beginning to restructure... Wait, no! It's not a cave! It's one gigantic machine!", 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's report this to Babylonia first.", 3: '33'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Unable to connect via long-ranged transmission with Babylonia. The cave seems to be jamming our signal.', 4: '1'}
{2: '...We have no other choice then.', 3: '37'}
{2: "Let's regroup, then continue to work our way inward.", 3: '38'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Roger. The restructuring appears to be working its way inward... Maybe if we reach further inside, we'll find an answer.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory284.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "...You've been sitting in front of the terminal for half an hour. Did you find anything?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'I think you should come and see for yourself.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Hassen walks up to Celica's terminal and finds more than a dozen files pulled up on her terminal screen."}
{3: 'From newspaper clippings during the Golden Age to ground intel shared by the Forsaken.'}
{3: 'All of which share a single commonality—the circular logo of the School.'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "What's this?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Even though the World Government was unable to catch any of its members, it did find many hidden facilities belonging to the School all over the world.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Lagerman Royal Arsenal... A warehouse in Port Bian'an...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Putting all this information together, it seems that the scope of the School far exceeds our expectations.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'However, when troops entered the facilities, they found that the facilities had been emptied—no materials, no products.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'But according to logistics data, the raw materials in circulation there would be enough to make both light and heavy equipment for a small army.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'But whatever they made with these materials had disappeared along with them.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'What could they have made with raw materials and machinery of this scale?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "It seems like they've been long gone, but I still have a sneaking suspicion that...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "...Maybe it's only just a suspicion.", 4: '1'}
